trans-unit.source: A trigger action that advances a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to the end of its fill period.
trans-unit.target: 之前的觸發程序動作<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>到其填滿期間結尾。

trans-unit.source: Use a SkipStoryboardToFill action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to advance a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to its fill period, if it has one.
trans-unit.target: 使用與 SkipStoryboardToFill 動作<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>或<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>前進<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>來填滿期間，如果有的話。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: This action also advances all child <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> objects of the target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to their fill periods, if they have them.
trans-unit.target: 這個動作也會往前移所有子<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>的目標物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>它們具有其填滿期間。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>

trans-unit.source: SkipStoryboardToFill only affects an active <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).
trans-unit.target: SkipStoryboardToFill 只會影響作用中<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>(之後<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>啟動)。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 暫停、 繼續、 停止或否則控制項分鏡腳本以互動方式可以暫停、 繼續或控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>，以互動方式設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>屬性其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>並用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>物件 (例如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) 來控制參考其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>並未指定，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>無法在之後開始時以互動方式控制。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[如何︰ 控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SkipStoryboardToFill"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SkipStoryboardToFill"></xref>類別。
